name: Service Partner Inspection
description: Streamlined service partner checklist for battery swap, medkit verification, and essential safety checks

metadata.author: Oliver Wallin
metadata.safetyNote: Minimal onsite inspection - RemoteTI handles detailed technical checks

tasks.title: SAFETY: Review safety requirements
tasks.description: Review critical safety requirements before starting.
instructions: Ensure PPE is available and worn.
Verify area is safe for inspection.
Keep drone powered ON during inspection.

tasks.title: PRS: Disarm the parachute system
tasks.description:
ALWAYS WEAR SAFETY GOGGLES AND HEARING PROTECTION.

Switch the parachute fuse to SAFE.
instructions: Put on safety goggles and hearing protection.
Locate PRS fuse below the PRS tube.
Verify switch is secure in SAFE position.

tasks.title: DRONE: Open battery compartment
tasks.description: Open drone compartment for battery access.
instructions: Unscrew 4 lid screws (2 on each side) with torque screwdriver.
Check for debris or moisture inside.
Check that the white seal is OK and undamaged.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Verify new batteries ready
tasks.description: Check new batteries are fully charged and undamaged.
instructions: Verify both new batteries are over 50.3V.
Ensure batteries are clean and dry.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Remove old batteries
tasks.description: Safely remove the old batteries from the drone.
instructions: Check batteries for swelling or damage.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Put old batteries on charge
tasks.description: Connect old batteries to charging station.
instructions: Follow instructions at the charging station.

tasks.title: INSTRUCTION: Align the drone perfectly
tasks.description: Position the drone precisely on the visual navigation marker for proper alignment.
instructions: Align drone over visual navigation marker.
Place front landing gear on the two dots in front of marker.
Ensure front camera faces correct direction.
Verify drone body perfectly aligned with visual navigation markers.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Install front battery
tasks.description: Install the front battery in the drone.
instructions: Secure velcro straps over battery wires.

tasks.title: BATTERIES: Install back battery
tasks.description: Install the back battery in the drone.
instructions: Secure velcro straps over battery wires.

tasks.title: DRONE: Close battery compartment
tasks.description: Close and secure the battery compartment.
instructions: Check no cables will be pinched.
Ensure no gaps between lids and core.
Screw in 4 screws (2 per side) with torque screwdriver.

tasks.title: POWER: Inspect umbilical contacts
tasks.description: Check umbilical connection points for damage.
instructions: Check copper surfaces on landing gear.

tasks.title: POWER: Attach umbilical to drone
tasks.description: Connect umbilical for power supply.
instructions: Connect umbilical next to the left landing gear.

tasks.title: MEDKIT: Verify contents and AED status
tasks.description:
Verify MedKit contents and AED operational status.

Verify all utilities are included and in good condition.
Check AED is correctly placed inside MedKit.
Confirm AED status is OK.
Verify AED is dry, clean and free from damage.
instructions: Check AED is clean and undamaged.

tasks.title: WINCH: Thread and attach line
tasks.description:
Set up winch line for MedKit deployment.

Thread line through the red guide below drone.
Attach line securely to the spool.
Roll up line using button on winch housing.
Confirm spool spins smoothly with no abnormal noise.
instructions: Press and hold button to roll up line.

tasks.title: MEDKIT: Mount and secure MedKit
tasks.description: Mount the MedKit in position and secure it with the locking mechanism.
instructions: Attach magnetic connector to front right.

tasks.title: MOTORS: Test rotation by hand
tasks.description: Spin each motor to check for bearing issues.
instructions: Rotate each of 8 propellers slowly by hand.
Listen for crackling or grinding sounds.
STOP if any resistance or noise detected.

tasks.title: PROPELLERS: Quick visual inspection
tasks.description: Quick check for obvious propeller damage.
instructions: Look for obvious chips or cracks.

tasks.title: SKYBASE: Quick area check
tasks.description: Quick check of Skybase area.

tasks.title: PRS: Arm the parachute system
tasks.description:
FINAL STEP - ARM PARACHUTE

ALWAYS WEAR SAFETY GOGGLES AND HEARING PROTECTION.
instructions: Put on safety goggles and hearing protection.

tasks.title: DOCUMENTATION: Report completion
tasks.description: Document inspection completion.
